input_text:
Job Title: Email Marketing Associate

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
About Oneskin #BeLimitless with OneSkin
Come redefine the future of aging with us. We're a longevity company. Everything we do, we do to help people age at the best version of themselves.
Our founding team is made up of four PhDs and entrepreneurial minds on a mission to transform the way we think about skin and aging. As the pioneers of skin health and longevity, we create science-based, clinically effective products to optimize skin and body health and provide support for people at every step of their “growing limitless” journey. Our longevity approach targets the root causes of aging using a proprietary peptide designed to decrease the accumulation of aged (senescent cells) in the skin -- and is the first product proven to reduce skin biological age in humans.
We never settle, and are continuously challenging existing treatments and methodologies to advance the frontier of skin science. As we help our customers grow limitless, we grow too -- by embracing individuality and differences, leading by example, and empowering ourselves and others with our passion for science, optimal health and innovation.
We are limitless. It's our mantra. Our commitment to helping anybody and everybody committed to live life the fullest regardless of their age.
The RoleWe are looking for an Email Marketing Assistant to own our end-to-end email & SMS campaign calendar and campaign processes. This person will be in charge of planning our campaign calendar, contributing to overall business goals and objectives such as product cross-sell & subscription rates, revenue, and customer engagement. This person will effectively project manage the entire email & SMS campaign process from start to finish, working closely with copywriters, designers, customer service and the broader marketing team. As the main point of contact for our campaigns, you will be responsible for running ongoing A/B testing, reporting on campaign performance, campaign optimizations based on learnings, and compiling metrics to share with the team.
ResponsibilitiesCreate and manage a monthly campaign calendar, taking into account overall business objectives and historical campaign performance, to drive subscriptions, revenue, education & positive customer experienceResponsible for the planning and implementation of testing & optimization strategy inclusive of A/B testing, and content/audience optimizations to drive customer engagement & revenueWrite creative marketing briefs and collaborate with copywriters and designers to create campaigns; ensure creatives utilize learnings from previous campaigns, for real-time campaign optimization.Ensure all email & SMS campaigns are clear, on-brand and free of any errors/typosUtilize Klaviyo to build, QA and schedule email & SMS campaigns, segment lists, and pull campaign performance dataAnalyze campaign data to understand performance, channel engagement metrics and channel strategyMaintain the email and SMS marketing dashboard with updated data for weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly reportingRequirementsBachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field1-3 year experience in Digital Marketing with preference for at least 1 year of Email MarketingStrong attention to detail to ensure all campaigns are perfect before sendingExperience with A/B testing, analyzing campaign performance metrics and arriving at actionable recommendations for future campaignsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsMust thrive in a fast-paced environmentExperience in Asana and Klaviyo a plus

Why join us?
OneSkin is the pioneering company in the longevity skin and health industry with high performance products derived from years of aging and skin biology research. OneSkin is positioned to be a leading company when it comes to products designed to target skin aging, and has a unique opportunity in fast-growing markets of beauty, wellness and longevity. Our mission is to build a future where aging does not equal limitations or suffering, but simply more years to celebrate life with our loved ones. We are set to redefine how we experience aging in the near future.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Email Marketing Associate
output_json.summary: Email Marketing Assistant to own end-to-end email & SMS campaign calendar and processes.
job_responsibilities: Create and manage monthly campaign calendar
Plan and implement testing & optimization strategy
Ensure campaign clarity, branding, and error-free execution
Use Klaviyo for campaign building, QA, scheduling, segmentation, and data pulling
Analyze campaign data for performance insights
Maintain email and SMS marketing dashboard
output_json.company_information: OneSkin is a longevity company focused on skin health and aging, creating science-based products to optimize skin and body health. The company aims to help people age at the best version of themselves through its proprietary peptide technology.
